abstract:
The work presented in this paper focuses on the use of hidden
Markov models for face recognition. A new method based on the extraction
of 2D-DCT feature vectors is described, and the recognition results are
compared with other face recognition approaches. The method introduced
reduces significantly the computational complexity of previous HMM-based
face recognition system, while preserving the same recognition
rate
